products.title: Stirlo Primrose Yellow
products.metadescription: Made to measure stirlo primrose yellow roller blind | privacy, dim-out fabric | blindsbypost
products.productdescription: Stirlo primrose yellow plain roller blind the stirlo range boast a fantastic range of dim-out privacy fabrics to compliment any room. The fabric is composed of 100% polyester and is rolled around a strong, rust free aluminium tube. The blind is supplied with a premium control mechanism with white chain used as standard, or a nickel metal chain can be chosen above to upgrade. Supplied with the blinds are installation instructions and universal brackets suitable for top, side and face fixing. If the width and the drop are greater than 1800mm, the fabric may be joined either by a stitch or weld dependant on their professional discretion.

products.title: Palate Barley Gold Roller Blind
products.metadescription: Palate barley gold roller blind
products.productdescription: The palate blackout roller blind range is a great option for bedrooms due to the blackout fabric blocking all light from passing through the fabric. With a range of colour to choose from in this range, you'll find a perfect match for your room.  Keep your blinds looking their best with this easy to wipe clean fabric, just use a damp cloth to wipe away any dirt or stains.  Being fully blackout this fabric is perfect for privacy as it will prevent any light from passing through the material.

products.title: Amor Yellow Submarine Roller Blind
products.metadescription: Amor yellow submarine roller blind. Bring the colour of sunshine into your home! A 100% blackout fabric means no matter how much it rains you'll always be seeing that bright yellow. Made to measure roller blinds.
products.productdescription: Make a statement in your home with the vibrant yellow colour in the amor yellow submarine. This blind is sure to add some zing to your interior and with a name like yellow submarine youll be singing your way round your home before you know it. This is a blackout fabric and is perfect for bedrooms as it will stop all of the light from passing through the fabric.  Keep your blinds looking their best with this easy to wipe clean fabric, just use a damp cloth to wipe away any dirt or stains.  Being fully blackout this fabric is perfect for privacy as it will prevent any light from passing through the material.  All of their blinds are sold with built-in child safety mechanisms. We adhere to the guidelines set out by the british blind and shutter association and take safety extremely seriously. All blinds come with the relevant child safety instructions and warnings. Please ensure you follow the provided instructions and warnings carefully. Please visit www.Makeitsafe.Org.Uk to find out more. All control chains supplied with their roller blinds will be approximately half the length of the drop. If you require a longer control chain, please get in touch once ordered and we can amend this for you.

products.title: Andes Machu Gold Roller Blind
products.metadescription: The yellow and gold tones to the andes machu gold make this blind a real showstopper. Perfect for adding colour and style to your window, this print is delicate yet bold with it's intricate print that is best seen close up.
products.productdescription: The yellow and gold tones to the andes machu gold make this blind a real showstopper.
